ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:59:58 [Issue ID 4000-118684] urn:comicvine:4000-118684 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 01:33:39. [Issue ID 118684]
ComicInfo.Summary: The "High Noon" story line concludes in grand fashion as a little boys fate is left in the hands of Jackie, the most unlikely of saviors. But, how can even Jackie save himself being trapped upon an oil rig, surrounded by gun toting thugs, in the middle of water, during broad daylight!?! Could it get any worse? We even wonder if The Darkness and his little pals can save the day this time!
ComicInfo.Tags: The Franchetti Family,Jenny Romano,Miami,Frankie Franchetti,Darklings,Jackie Estacado
ComicInfo.Title: High Noon, Part 3
